prompts: Create a majestic fire-type Pokemon with flowing flames and a beautiful mane.
I want a Pokemon that resembles a horse with vibrant orange and yellow colors.
Generate a mythical creature that gallops through flames, showcasing its fiery spirit.
Make a Pokemon design that captures the essence of a wild, flame-covered horse.
Imagine a powerful fire-type Pokemon with a sleek body and a radiant mane.
Design a Pokemon that embodies speed and grace, with a fiery finish.
Show me a Pokemon that thrives in grasslands, with bright colors and a dynamic pose.

distinctive_features: Hooves that appear to be lit
